code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./banner.css';import MovieContent from'../components/MovieContent';import PlayBtn from'../components/PlayBtn';import MovieSwiper from'../components/MovieSwiper';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Banner(){const[movies,setMovies]=useState([]);const[isModalOpen,setIsModalOpen]=useState(false);const fetchData=()=>{fetch(process.env.PUBLIC_URL+'/data/movieData.json').then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setMovies(data)).catch(e=>console.log(e.message));};useEffect(()=>{fetchData();},[]);const handleSlideChange=id=>{const newMovies=movies.map(movie=>{movie.active=false;if(movie._id===id){movie.active=true;}return movie;});setMovies(newMovies);};const handlePlayChange=modalState=>{setIsModalOpen(modalState);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"banner",children:[movies&&movies.length>0&&movies.map(movie=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"movie",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:movie.bgImg,alt:"Background Image",className:"bgImg ".concat(movie.active?'active':undefined)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container-fluid",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-lg-6 col-md-12",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MovieContent,{movie:movie})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-lg-6 col-md-12",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PlayBtn,{movie:movie,onPlayChange:handlePlayChange})})]})})]},movie._id)),movies&&movies.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MovieSwiper,{slides:movies,slideChange:handleSlideChange,isModalOpen:isModalOpen})]});}export default Banner;
